column4: I have a number of directories contiaining zips. http://pastebin.com/TEU8iPBp ... From the parent, I want to unzip all of them.  "unzip \*/\*.zip" doesn't work.  Any ideas?
I'm sorry I posted that twice.
are you sure unzip supports multiple files at all? i have some vague recollection that it doesn't
in which case, try:  for file in */*.zip; do unzip "$file"; done
